synonyms: aniṣṭa—of some mishap; śaṅkīni—possessing doubts; bandhu—of friends or relatives; hṛdayāni—hearts; bhavanti—become; hi—certainly.
translation: "A relative or intimate friend is always fearful of some injury to his beloved."

purport.content: This is a quotation from the Abhijñāna-śakuntala-nāṭaka.
